233.description: Ethereal. (not Ethereal.) The first card you play each turn is played twice.

234.name: Electrodynamics
234.description:
Lightning now hits ALL enemies.
Channel 2(3) Lightning.

235.name: Fission
235.description: Remove (Evoke) ALL of your Orbs. Gain 1 Energy and draw 1 card for each Orb removed(evoked). Exhaust.

236.name: Hyperbeam
236.description:
Deal 26(34) damage to ALL enemies.
Lose 3 Focus.

237.name: Machine Learning
237.description:
(Innate.)
At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

239.name: Multi-Cast
239.description: Evoke your next Orb X (X+1) times.

240.name: Rainbow
240.description:
Channel 1 Lightning, 1 Frost, and 1 Dark.
Exhaust. (does not Exhaust.)

241.name: Reboot
241.description:
Shuffle all of your cards into your draw pile, then draw 4(6) cards.
Exhaust.

242.name: Seek
242.description:
Choose a (2) card(s) from your draw pile and place it (them) into your hand.
Exhaust.

243.name: Thunder Strike
243.description: Deal 7(9) damage to a random enemy for each Lightning Channeled this combat.

248.name: Bowling Bash
248.description: Deal 7(10) damage for each enemy in combat.

251.name: Crush Joints
251.description: Deal 8(10) damage. If the previous card played was a skill, apply 1(2)  Vulnerable.

255.name: Evaluate
255.description: Gain 6(10)  Block. Shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.

256.name: Flurry of Blows
256.description: Deal 4(6) damage. On Stance change, returns from the Discard Pile into your hand.

258.name: Follow-Up
258.description: Deal 7(11) damage. If the previous card played was an Attack, gain Energy.

259.name: Halt
259.description: Gain 3(4)  Block. Wrath: Gain 9(14) additional  block.

261.name: Pressure Points
261.description: Apply 8(11) Mark. ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.

264.name: Sash Whip
264.description: Deal 8(10) damage. If the last card played this combat was an Attack, apply 1(2)  Weak.

267.name: Battle Hymn
267.description: (Innate.) At the start of each turn add a Smite into your hand.

268.name: Carve Reality
268.description: Deal 6(10) damage. Add a Smite into your hand.

269.name: Collect
269.description: Put an Upgraded Miracle into your hand at the start of your next X(+1) turns. Exhaust.

270.name: Conclude
270.description: Deal 12(16) damage to ALL enemies. End your turn.

271.name: Deceive Reality
271.description: Gain 4(7)  Block. Add a Safety to your hand.

273.name: Fasting
273.description: Gain 3(4)  Strength. Gain 3(4)  Dexterity. Gain 1 less Energy at the start of each turn.

274.name: Fear No Evil
274.description: Deal 8(11) damage. If the enemy intends to Attack, enter Calm.

275.name: Foreign Influence
275.description: Choose 1 of 3 Attacks of any color to add to your hand. (It costs 0 this turn.) Exhaust.

276.name: Foresight
276.description: At the start of your turn, Scry 3(4).

277.name: Indignation
277.description: If you are in Wrath, apply 3(5)  Vulnerable to ALL enemies, otherwise enter Wrath.

278.name: Inner Peace
278.description: If you are in Calm, draw 3(4) cards, otherwise Enter Calm.

279.name: Like Water
279.description: At the end of your turn, if you are in Calm, gain 5(7)  Block.

280.name: Meditate
280.description: Put 1(2) card(s) from your discard pile into your hand and  Retain it. Enter Calm. End your turn.

281.name: Mental Fortress
281.description: Whenever you switch Stances, gain 4(6)  Block.

283.name: Perseverance
283.description: Retain. Gain 5(7)  Block. Whenever this card is  Retained, increase its  Block by 2(3).

284.name: Pray
284.description: Gain 3(4)  Mantra. Shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.

285.name: Reach Heaven
285.description: Deal 10(15) damage. Shuffle a Through Violence into your draw pile.

286.name: Rushdown
286.description: Whenever you enter Wrath, draw 2 cards.

287.name: Sanctity
287.description: Gain 6(9)  Block. If the previous card played was a Skill, draw 2 card.

288.name: Sands of Time
288.description: Retain. Deal 20(26) damage. Whenever this card is  Retained, lower its cost by 1.

289.name: Signature Move
289.description: Can only be played if this is the only attack in your hand. Deal 30(40) damage.

290.name: Simmering Fury
290.description: At the start of your next turn, enter Wrath and draw 2(3) cards.

291.name: Study
291.description: At the end of your turn, shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.

292.name: Swivel
292.description: Gain 8(11)  Block. The next Attack you play costs 0.

293.name: Talk to the Hand
293.description: Deal 5(7) damage. Whenever you attack this enemy, gain 2(3)  Block. Exhaust.

294.name: Tantrum
294.description: Deal 3 damage 3(4) times. Enter Wrath. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

295.name: Wallop
295.description: Deal 9(12) damage. Gain  Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

296.name: Wave of the Hand
296.description: Whenever you gain  Block this turn, apply 1(2)  Weak to ALL enemies.

297.name: Weave
297.description: Deal 4(6) damage. Whenever you Scry and would discard this card, add it into your hand instead.

299.name: Windmill Strike
299.description: Retain. Deal 7(10) damage. Whenever this card is  Retained, increase its damage by 4(5).

301.name: Wreath of Flame
301.description: Your next Attack deals 5(8) additional damage.

302.name: Alpha
302.description: (Innate.) Shuffle a Beta into your draw pile. Exhaust.

303.name: Blasphemy
303.description: (Retain.) Enter Divinity. Die next turn. Exhaust.

304.name: Brilliance
304.description: Deal 12(16) damage. Deals additional damage for all  Mantra gained this combat.

305.name: Conjure Blade
305.description: Shuffle an Expunger with X(+1) into your draw pile. Exhaust.

306.name: Deus Ex Machina
306.description: Unplayable. When you draw this card, add 2(3) Miracles into your hand. Exhaust.

307.name: Deva Form
307.description: Ethereal. At the start of your turn, gain Energy and increase this gain by 1. (not Ethereal.)

308.name: Devotion
308.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2(3)  Mantra.

309.name: Establishment
309.description: (Innate.) Whenever a card is  Retained, lower its cost by 1.

310.name: Judgment
310.description: If the enemy has 30(40) or less HP, set their HP to 0.

311.name: Lesson Learned
311.description: Deal 10(13) damage. If this kills an enemy, Upgrade a random card in your deck. Exhaust.

312.name: Master Reality
312.description: Whenever a card is created during combat, Upgrade it.

313.name: Omniscience
313.description: Choose a card in your draw pile. Play the chosen card twice and Exhaust it. Exhaust.

314.name: Ragnarok
314.description: Deal 5(6) damage to a random enemy 5(6) times.

315.name: Scrawl
315.description: Draw cards until your hand is full. Exhaust.

316.name: Spirit Shield
316.description: Gain 3(4)  Block for each card in your hand.

317.name: Vault
317.description: Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn. Exhaust.

318.name: Wish
318.description: Choose one: Gain 6(8)  Plated Armor, 3(4)  Strength, or 25(30) Gold. Exhaust.
